sentences.en: An airtight inflatable pad used as or on a bed a cushion.
sentences.cn: 气垫充气垫子,用作床或放在床上.

sentences.en: Cool completely, then store in an airtight bin until ready to serve.
sentences.cn: 完全冷却, 然后储存于密封罐中.

sentences.en: He can make somebody's will so airtight you can't break it.
sentences.cn: 他能帮别人把遗嘱写的无懈可击.
米克有确凿的不在场证据。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVETo evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the airtight infusion method.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨全密闭式输液方式的安全性、有效性.

sentences.en: Please make the fruit jar airtight.
Store tea in an airtight container away from strong smells.
sentences.cn: 把茶叶贮存在不透风的罐子里,避开异味.

sentences.en: Store the cake in an airtight container.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕存放在密封容器里。

sentences.en: Store the cookies in an airtight tin.
sentences.cn: 把饼干存放在密封的金属罐中。

sentences.en: Store the peppercorns in an airtight container and grind the pepper as you need it.
sentences.cn: 将胡椒粒储存在密封容器中，在需要的时候磨成粉。

sentences.en: The goods are packed in airtight container.
sentences.cn: 货物被装在密封的集装箱内.

sentences.en: The police verified that she had an airtight alibi.
sentences.cn: 警方查明她有着无懈可击的不在犯罪现场的证据.

sentences.en: There is some bloated cabbage in the airtight pot.
sentences.cn: 那个闷罐儿里腌制着一些白菜.

sentences.en: They have the characteristics of strong intensity, light material , airtight, anticorrosion, aging resistance, low cost, etc.
sentences.cn: 具有强度好 、 质轻 、 不透气 、 耐腐蚀 、 抗老化 、 价格低等特点.

sentences.en: This means that people going inside must pass through at least two airtight doors.
sentences.cn: 这意味着:人们要进去的话,至少要通过两道密封门.

words.tran_cn: 密闭的，密封的；无懈可击的

trans.tran_cn: 不透气的，密封的，<主美口>（防守等）严密的，无懈可击的
trans.tran_en: not allowing air to get in or out
